fulltext:
PHAN MINH LUAN 
Senior Full-stack Web Developer 
Phone: +84901264846 
Email: phanminhluan@outlook.com 
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/phanluanint 
ABOUT ME 
This is a profile of an independent team player 
I am an independent 
With over 4 years of experience on web development, I have a chance to familiarize with NodeJS, 
PHP together with MongoDB, MySQL on the back-end and ReactJS, JQuery, JS, HTML, CSS on the 
front-end. 
After building a good foundation, I advanced my research about coding convention and optimization. 
Because of that, I have confidence with my abilities to initialize, develop, deploy and maintain a large 
scalability web project. 
I love new technologies. In the future, it would be great for me to take a challenge with a high-tech 
project. 
I am a team player 
My team is my second family to me which are always there to help out one and the others, I'm happy 
to share my experience, knowledge to them and also learn from them. 
As a sub-team leader, I guide my team members to be independent. Improve their researching skills, 
giving them a pointer to solve the problem. I motivate my team to work hard and develop high-quality 
products that we can be proud of. 
I also want to take on bigger administration role as it will be the next progress of my career. 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Tinselworks Sdn Bhd (Apr 2018 - Present) 
A Malaysia technology company, focus on internet-of-things and blockchain development. 
Full-stack Web Developer 
ETH Blockchain Game 
- 
Wrote ETH Smart Contract with Solidity language 
- 
Implemented Smart Contact to a web game running on NodeJS, JS 
Technologies: NodeJS, JavaScript, Web3JS, MongoDB, HTML, SCSS, PixiJS, SVG, Solidity, 
Webpack 
POS System 
- 
Designed workflow, database & initialized a point of sale (POS) system 
- 
Create desktop version of POS using ElectronJS 
- 
Working with hardware such as Thermal Printer & Barcode Scanner 
Technologies: NodeJS, Serverless, ReactJS, ElectronJS, MongoDB, NeDB, HTML, SCSS, 
Webpack 
DevOps Engineer 
- 
Designed infrastructure and setup AWS servers for ETH blockchain game 
- 
Setup continuous integration for ETH blockchain game with Gitlab CI for both testing and 
production environment 
- 
Setup GETH server for ETH blockchain network 
Technologies: AWS EC2, Gitlab CI, Linux, Ubuntu, AWS S3, Bash 
Sub-Team Leader 
- 
Managing a team with 2 – 3 members working in web development 
- 
Drafting reports and working with Team Leader & Project Manager 
- 
Monitoring team progress towards delivery goals 
- 
Planning & researching solutions independently or collaboratively with Team Leader & PM 
Tools: InvisionApp, Trello, Asana, Gitlab 
Edgeworks Software Ltd (May 2016 – Mar 2018) 
A Germany out-sourcing software company, delivery high-technology & high-quality products for 
clients located in Germany, Australia, Hong Kong, …. 
Full-stack Web Developer 
Online Learning Platform 
- 
Full stack web developer for end-to-end SaaS/Cloud apps development 
- 
Forked and customized some open-source to be integrated as micro-services 
- 
Customized UI on multiple platforms for consistently of all micro-services 
Technologies: ReactJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, MySQL, PHP (Laravel), HTML, SCSS, Gulp 
Venue Booking System 
- 
Worked directly with the client to receive their requirements 
- 
Implemented new features based on client's requirements 
- 
Updated both frontend and backend for better user-experience and performance improvement 
- 
Designed and optimize heavy MySQL queries for better performance 
- 
Reported to the leader for the working progress 
Technologies: PHP (CodeIgniter, Laravel, WordPress), HTML, SCSS, CoffeeScript, JQuery 
Tools: JIRA, Bitbucket, Slack 
DevOps Engineer 
- 
Built and deployed Docker containers for micro-services 
- 
Wrote OpenShift templates for faster production deployment using Openshift service 
Technologies: Docker, OpenShift, Linux, Heroku, Apache, Nginx 
VNAppTech Co Ltd (Mar 2015 – Mar 2016) 
Web Developer 
- 
Initialize, develop, deploy and maintain some Vietnamese small projects 
- 
Worked directly with the client to receive their requirements 
- 
Planed & researched solutions independently 
Technologies: PHP (CodeIgniter, WordPress), HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery 
ACCOMPLISHMENTS 
Kamijimat POS (Feb 2019 – Present) 
A point of sale system, focus on checkout, manage stock items & purchase order items from the 
network of suppliers 
MyEtherPony (Apr 2018 – Feb 2019) 
A digital pet game on the blockchain that lets you collect and trade digital collectibles in the form of 
ponies. See project 
ExlHub (aka ExlSkills) (Sep 2017 – Mar 2018) 
A web application for learning in-demand tech skills for free, gain employment-focused certifications, 
consult live experts, and make money teaching others online. See project 
Venuemob (May 2016 – Sep 2017) 
The number one spot to find and book the perfect venue for an event. Completely free to use, 
Venuemob connects the user with some of the most renowned, unique and hidden venues in 
Australia. Backed by Optus and the University of Melbourne, Venuemob crowned ‘Best Product or 
Service’ at the 2017 Australian Event Awards. See project 
EDUCATION 
Lac Hong University (2011 – 2016) 
I graduated from Lac Hong University as a software engineer (major in Information Technology) on 
March of 2016. 
Phan Van Tri High School (2008 – 2011) 
I learned at Phan Van Tri High School in Ben Tre. 
LANGUAGE 
Vietnamese: native language. 
English: intermediate.
